item.title: About
item.description: Michael Marshall Summary: Sr. Site Reliability Engineer - Neiman Marcus Cloud Enthusiast, 5xAWS Certified, Terraform Associate Certified, VMware VCD-DCA, AWS Solutions Architect, DevOps, SRE, Cloud automation, Developer with 25+ years industry experience 3 of which with Neiman Marcus. I enjoy amateur radio, weather tracking, and being a devoted father and husband. Contact: Email: mrmikemarshall@gmail.com LinkedIn GitHub
